name: NORTHERN RIVERS AERO CLUB INCORPORATED
about: The Northern Rivers Aero Club Incorporated is a comprehensive flying school located in the Northern Rivers region of New South Wales. We offer a range of pilot training programs, from the Recreational Aviation Certificate to a Commercial Pilot Licence. Our training facility is equipped to provide students with the necessary skills and knowledge to achieve their aviation goals. We also offer additional training such as Private Pilot Licences and Night Ratings. With experienced instructors and a supportive learning environment, the Northern Rivers Aero Club is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots reach new heights. We are committed to providing high-quality aviation education and ensuring our students are well-prepared for a career in flying.
services:
["RA-AUS Pilot Certificate
CASA Flight Crew Licencing
Recreational Pilot Licence
Private Pilot Licence
Commerical Pilot Licence"]
